name: Mr. Rogers
description: The kind-hearted host stands in his familiar living room, changing into his cardigan sweater with a warm smile. The atmosphere around him radiates acceptance and gentle wisdom.

dialogue.greeting: Hello, neighbor! What a special day this is - a day to recall precious memories together.

about_memories.initial: Every memory is special, just like every neighbor in our neighborhood.
about_memories.childhood: Remember the simple joys, like a friendly wave from a neighbor, or a kind word shared.
about_memories.connection: When we recall these moments together, they become even more precious.

about_neighborhood.initial: In this neighborhood, every memory finds its place to belong.
about_neighborhood.sharing: Sometimes sharing a memory helps us understand its true value.
about_neighborhood.kindness: Each remembered moment of kindness makes our neighborhood brighter.

about_imagination.initial: In the Neighborhood of Make-Believe, memories come alive in special ways.
about_imagination.play: Let's take these childhood moments and give them new life through play.
about_imagination.wonder: When we believe in our memories, wonderful things can happen.

cardigan.message: Would you like to borrow a cardigan sweater? It helps make sharing memories more comfortable.

puzzle_complete.message: You've learned that every memory, like every person, is special in its own way.
